patthana20.5:4.1: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:4.2: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:4.3: Nasārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo ca anārammaṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:5.1: Naanārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:6.1: Nasārammaṇañca naanārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:8.1: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:8.2: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:8.3: Nacittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca citto ca nocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:9.1: Nanocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.5:10.1: Nacittañca nanocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana20.5:12.1: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:12.2: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:12.3: Nacetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:13.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:14.1: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:14.2: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:14.3: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.5:15.1: Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:15.2: Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:15.3: Nacittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana20.5:16.1: Nacittasampayuttañca nacittavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:18.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:18.2: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:18.3: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭho ca cittavisaṃsaṭṭho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:19.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:20.1: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:20.2: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:20.3: Nacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:22.1: Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:22.2: Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:22.3: Nacittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasahabhū ca nocittasahabhū ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:23.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:24.1: Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:24.2: Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:24.3: Nacittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittānuparivattī ca nocittānuparivattī ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:25.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:26.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:27.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:28.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:29.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:30.1: Nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:31.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … purejāte āsevane pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:32.1: Naajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:33.1: Nabāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:34.1: Naajjhattikañca nabāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana20.5:35.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca … pe … avigate nava.
patthana20.5:36.1: Naupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:37.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana20.5:38.1: Naupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana20.5:39.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
